data.name: The Den of Chaos2 - 混沌の魔窟殿２～アッサマラームの遺跡編～
data.detailed_description:
The story follows the protagonist, Maria Belle, as she exterminates monsters, this time in the ruins.

The player controls a dot-picture character to fight monsters and explore dungeons.
If you lose a battle or get caught in a dungeon trap, you will be punished in a naughty way.

While searching for key items in the dungeon
Obtain items from treasure chests and food stalls to strengthen the main character and take on the battle.


There are only boss battles in all 7 stages, and the play time is approximately 60 minutes or longer.


Please use a separate application if you want to play with a pad or other devices.

This game is only available in Japanese, but you can switch the language setting from Japanese to English by pressing the "3" key on the keyboard during the game.
If the language is set to English, the pre- and post-battle and defeat scenes, as well as some of the UI, will be displayed in English.

Please use a separate application if you want to play with a pad or other devices.

This game is only available in Japanese, but you can switch the language setting from Japanese to English by pressing the "3" key on the keyboard during the game.

data.short_description: This is a boss rush style pixel art action game consisting of all 7 stages. If you are defeated or trapped after stage 2, you will be punished.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows® 10
  • Processor: Core i5 2.3GHz or better
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Storage: 200 MB available space

content_descriptors.notes: This game may contain content that is not intended for all ages or may not be suitable for viewing at work: nudity or sexual content, sex acts, sex without consent, general content for adults
